text: @realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @FoxNews Bottom line..if you resign, Pence can take over and at least make an attempt to help people deal with Covid-19 w/o U having control. If not, we'll wait for Joe, but you need to go. Now or later.....you are killing Americans.  Moving on is not the answer! IMHO, of course!
